sentences: Seesugust meeleolu tundis ta eneses tekkivat ka praegu: optimistlikku ja tugevat, sellele vaatamata et koosolek oli pisut käest ära läinud.
See raamat on antud sellele lapsele.
context: Sellele is the allative singular form of 'see' (this/that) in Estonian. The allative case indicates motion towards or destination, so it can be translated as 'to this' or 'for this'. It's commonly used when something is being given to someone or directed toward something.
